nodes.text: Black Spire Brew was a beverage available in Oga's Cantina in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu. The drink was caf-based and brown in color, and it was served over ice in a tall glass that was garnished with fruit. It was considered richer than Spiran caf. During the Clone Wars, the cantina's bartender Janott listed the drink among those available to the human Senator Padmé Amidala when she visited the cantina. The drink was still available in 34 ABY.

Black Spire Brew was first mentioned in the 2018 novel Thrawn: Alliances, which was written by Timothy Zahn. The drink is available for customers to purchase during breakfast at the Oga's Cantina bar in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge. It is a coffee drink with a cold brew. The menu's description reads, "Cold Brew Joffrey's Coffee, honey, falernum, passion fruit, citrus." When the drink was promoted in advance of the opening alongside Moogan tea, they were erroneously identified with their names swapped; Black Spire Brew was subsequently labelled correctly at the bar.
